metadata.name: Login to Disabled Account
metadata.comment: Detect failed attempts to sign in to disabled accounts.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (status_id = 50057 AND lower(status_detail) = lower('user account is disabled. the account has been disabled by an administrator.'))

output.summary: Detect failed attempts to sign in to disabled accounts.
